I

iArray - Class in imr.util
 
identity(int) - Static method in class imr.matrix.Matrix
Static method to get a n-order identity matrix.
imr.matrix - package imr.matrix
The matrix package provides classes to perform the most common operations applied to matrices and vectors.
imr.media - package imr.media
The media package provides a general purpose player supporting the following extensions: mp3 mid wav The SoundPlayer class has support to play lists, loop and shuffle.
imr.media.audio - package imr.media.audio
The audio package provides an audio player supporting the following extensions: mp3 wav The SoundPlayer in the media package is multipurpose and also supports playing MIDI files, but if you only need an audio player to play single files you can choose this option.
imr.media.midi - package imr.media.midi
The midi package provides classes to manage MIDI data and wrappers to javax.sound.midi classes.
imr.util - package imr.util
The util package provides a useful class to resize, get chunks, clone and print one, two and three-dimensional arrays of any kind of type included the atomic ones.
init(String) - Method in class imr.media.midi.MIDIFile
Prepares the process to handle the file passed as parameter.
init(String) - Method in class imr.media.midi.MIDIFileReader
Inits to process the file passed as parameter.
init(String) - Method in class imr.media.midi.MIDIFileWriter
Inits to write the file passed as parameter.
InputReader - Class in imr.util
The InputReader class defines static methods to get strings and any kind of atomic numeric data from the command line.
inverse() - Method in class imr.matrix.Matrix
Gets the inverse of a matrix.

MIDIMessage - Class in imr.media.midi
